main.name: Konstantinos Papadopoulos
main.bio: I am a Computer Science student from the University of Southampton and Software Engineering intern at JP Morgan & Chase. I am passionate about quantitative finance and would like to apply computational approaches to the financial services industry. On my free time, I like playing tennis, participating to hackathons, studying law and recently getting involved with deepfakes.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to leave me a message!

education.description: Expecting a 1st class degree. My third year project involves applying LSTM models for financial asset price prediction and evaluating against more traditional techniques. I have taken modules about Algorithms, Programming, Data Structures, Cyber Security and Machine Learning.
Achieved 3rd nationwide in my field with 18,660/20,000 marks for my national exams and the entry to university,

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Worked as a technology intern at a software engineering project where I took ownership of the full development cycle while partnering with other developers to design a solution that optimized the previous complex workflow. This experience offered me many learning opportunities regarding my area of  interest, financial markets and different lines of business within the organization.

work.title: Quantitative Researcher
work.description: I am working part time along with my studies for a high frequency trading company specializing in cryptocurrency trading and market making. Part of my role is researching and applying high frequency trading models to exploit market inefficiencies.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Worked on a project for a travel website (https://www.holidayemotions.com) that enabled us to offer touristic activities for our customers, expanding our business model which was focusing primarily on accommodation for tourists.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Worked as an intern web developer for one of the biggest car renting companies (https://www.carnmotion.gr) in Greece. My biggest responsibility was connecting our website with the web service of Enterprise Rent-A-Car. It was a great experience, where I learnt project management skills, used .NET frameworks, jQuery, HTML5, managed SQL databases and gained experience on working both as part of a team and independently.

projects.title: Kaggle Competition

testimonials.text: Konstantinos is a very hardworking individual with real passion for the job. He likes getting things done even if that means sacrificing a bit of his free time. He is the type of guy who always comes to work with a smile and will not go to sleep unless he solves that thing that has been bothering him all day.
